item.description: Join us this month where we will explore the mindset that every business women needs to effectively market and grow her business. We will discuss seven key areas where you may need a mindset shift. I will shed some light on how to shift your mindset in each key area so you can start to embrace marketing and even come to love it, like I do! This fun and interactive event is sure to help you see marketing in a new light. Join us won't you?
item.how_to_find_us: We have a private room on the second floor. Just take the elevator upstairs.

group.name: Dare To Be Phenomenal's Success Minded Women's Network

item.name: DARE To Be Phenomenal August Networking Event
